title: RPG Interface Essentials - Complete Collection
longDescription:
Video Preview

PREVIEW


RPG Interface Essentials Complete Collection brings together the 4 volumes of the RPG Interface Essentials series, which is composed of Inventory & Dialogue, Character & HUB, Map & Main Menu, Pop-Ups. All of them bring together a total of 584 sounds, with which you can complete all the interface sounds of your RPG, MMORPG video game or any game set in a fantasy world.


All the sounds included in this collection have been recorded and subsequently edited at 192 kHz/24-bit, and finally distrubuted at 96Khz/24 bits this way, whether you are a sound designer or simply want to use the sounds for your video game, you will get the highest quality possible.


With the included libraries you will get the following:


  • RPG Interface Essentials - Inventory & Dialogue: 157 sounds that enhance the gaming experience. Includes sound effects for actions with various inventory items, such as armor and potions, as well as dynamic effects for dialogue options, screen appearances, and scrolling, creating more engaging interactions. It also provides sounds for journal updates and the opening/closing of its pages, adding depth to the game's narrative.


  • RPG Interface Essentials - Character & HUB: 171 sounds divided into three key categories: buttons, with effects for actions such as choosing rewards and closing windows; characters, with sounds to adjust statistics, change characters, and equip accessories, amulets, armor, and weapons; and HUB, with sounds that accompany actions such as leveling up, selecting skills, and exploring the main menu.


  • RPG Interface Essentials - Map & Main Menu: 121 sounds. Includes effects for the map menu, such as fast travel and markers; distinctive sounds when opening and closing the pause menu; effects for the mission menu; sounds to open and close the skill tree; and a variety of sounds for the main menu, such as generic buttons, starting the game, and activating tutorials.


  • RPG Interface Essentials - Pop-Ups: 135 sounds divided into nine types of pop-ups: entry or discovery of new territory, experience, insufficient resources, neutral, item received, journal update, mission or quest completed, overwrite save game and save game , and special event completed.


More about the pack


  • Intuitive file naming
  • Use the sound effects over and over, in any of your projects or productions, forever without any additional fees or royalties. Use the SFX in your game, in your trailer, in a Kickstarter campaign, wherever you need to, as much as you want to.
  • Totally mono compatibility
  • All sounds have several variations.
  • Use your imagination and feel free to use any sound for other than the one described, remember that the world of sound is totally subjective.
technicalDetails:
Technical details:

  • 584 RPG interface sounds
  • Number of audio waves: 584
  • Format: 96kHz/24bit
  • Sound Effects Loop: No
  • Total duration: 14:53
